prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: full-body character design, a beautiful young woman standing center on a pure white background, impressionist oil painting style with rich light and shadow variations and visible brushstrokes. She has an extremely high level of beauty, with delicate and exquisite facial features. Her face is oval-shaped with fair, porcelain-like skin. She has large, expressive eyes the color of soft twilight, reflecting a gentle and observant nature, long dark eyelashes, a slender and elegant nose, and full, rosy lips set in a serene, contemplative expression. Her hair is long, flowing in soft, chestnut-brown waves, styled in an elegant yet effortless Victorian-inspired manner with a few delicate strands framing her face. She wears a refined Victorian-era walking dress in muted, elegant colors like dusty rose or sage green, made of fine wool and silk, with intricate lace details at the high neckline and cuffs. The dress fits her form gracefully, featuring a fitted bodice and a slightly draped skirt. A small, decorative hat adorned with a single feather or silk flower complements the outfit. Her posture is poised and graceful, embodying the唯美 and elegant aesthetic of the world. She holds a small, leather-bound notebook and a magnifying glass with an ornate handle, hinting at her investigative role. The overall atmosphere is优美细腻, capturing her "美之洞察" ability through her attentive gaze and appreciation for surrounding details. no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words., full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: oil_painting
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
